title: Reactions to racist posts on social media in the U.S. 2017
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis representing Response, and a y axis representing Share of respondents.
The highest category is found at Ignore_the_post where Share of respondents is 40.0.
The lowest category is found at Discuss_the_content_with_the_poster_offline_(e.g._on_the_phone_in_person_etc.) where Share of respondents is 6.0.
